item.title: Time Categories
item.description: Abstract This concept states that we should look at time in terms of its category in addition to its blocks (Deep Work Blocks) and roles (Roles). Simply, time can be seen as categories, the two main ones are Doing and Thinking. Thinking involves activities such as study, research and reading (Reading queue). Doing invovles anything action-oriented such as practice, writing for publishing (NOT note-taking or formulation), recording, composing, coding for a project (NOT reading guides) Application Use the 80/20 division of Doing/Study I want to use this on a weekly scale, assuming work weeks are 6 days, 12 hours a day (4 a.
